p: Carbon-coated SiO 2 composites were prepared using modified literature recipes according to the references [ 28, 29, 30, 31, 32, 33, 34, 35]. The carbon-coated SiO 2 composites preparation route is illustrated in Scheme 1. In brief, silica nanoparticles were added to a sucrose solution of varying concentration followed by water evaporation and carbonization in argon at 900 Â°C.
